mapper.select: SELECT id, status, mentor_intro AS mentorIntro, account_num AS accountNum, account_fee AS accountFee, review_num AS reviewNum, review_grade AS reviewGrade FROM mentor
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mentor (id, status, mentor_intro, account_num, account_fee, review_num, review_grade) VALUES (#{id), #{status}, #{mentorIntro}, #{accountNum}, #{accountFee}, #{reviewNum}, #{reviewGrade});
